ROW.NAME: 国标行业税负指标异常企业明细报表
平均税负
ROW.TIP: 不指定默认为行业平均负税率

ROW.NAME: 税管员
ROW.SQLWHE: deptid like (select decode(scope,'ALL','%',substr('[%SYS_DEPTID]',0,7 )||'%') from v_depts where id='[%SYS_DEPTID]') order by name

ROW.DATDSC: select flag,rownum rn,id,name,addr,somny,taxmny, taxbers,to_char(bears,'FM90.000') bears,cy,taxman,swjg from ( select '' flag, (select name from v_swjg sw where sw.id=substr(swjg_dm,0,7)) swjg, nvl(a.shxydm,a.id) id,a.name,a.addr,a.somny,a.taxmny, nvl(round(decode(somny,0,'0',taxmny/somny),3)*100,0) taxbers , nvl(a.bears,0) bears, (round(decode(somny,0,'0',taxmny/somny),3)-a.bears/100)*100 cy, a.taxman from ( select b.swjg_dm,b.shxydm,b.Id,b.name,max(b.addr) addr,nvl(sum(a.somny),0) somny, nvl(sum(a.taxmny),0) taxmny,nvl('[%TAXBEAR]',nvl(c.tax,0)) bears,d.name taxman from tax_taxdata a,tax_company b,V_TAX_GBCOMPCLASS c,v_tax_taxman d where a.id=b.id and b.taxman=d.id(+) and b.taxman like '%[%TAXMAN]%' and b.hymx_dm=c.id and c.year=(SELECT SUBSTR('[%YYMM1]',0,4) FROM DUAL) and b.hymx_dm='[%CORPID]' and a.yymm>='[%YYMM1]' and a.yymm<='[%YYMM2]' [%SWJGSTR] group by b.swjg_dm,b.shxydm,b.Id,b.name,d.name,nvl('[%TAXBEAR]',nvl(c.tax,0)) ) a where (id like '%[%CMID]%' or name like '%[%CMID]%') order by swjg_dm,cy desc,id )
select * from TAX_CS_FXYJJB order by bl desc
